summary: This mod add`s an nice player home across the river near Riverwood. So far it has an main hall, an living area and a basement
descriptionHtml:
[size=30][b][u][color=yellow][font=\"5\"]RIVERWOOD JARL HOUSE[/font][/color][/u][/b][/size]
SORRY GUYS THAT IT IS TAKING SO LONG TO UPDATE, BUT I AM VERY BUSSY AT THE MOMENT:(

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36289-1-1369162992.png[/img]

This mod add`s an nice player home across the river near Riverwood. It is verry much a work in progress. So far it has:
A main hall (whiterun temple theme)
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36289-1-1369163188.png[/img]
A living area (windhelm theme)
The living area is a nice and warm resting place with some mannequins and enough place to store weapons.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36289-1-1369164012.png[/img]
a basement (windhelm theme)
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36289-5-1369164583.png[/img]
It has an forge and everyting else you need for crafting and shaping your weapons in the basement. Also there is an throne with a bear next to it (witch is always sleeping, I am trying to change that.)
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36289-5-1369164790.png[/img]
And a large dinning table.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36289-3-1369164789.png[/img]
Outside the house there is an little pool with a mini dock.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36289-3-1369162994.png[/img] 

[size=5][b][u]Thing that i have on my mind to add:[/u][/b][list][/size]
[*]Merchants
[*]Npc`s in the basement
[*]Cleaner in the Living area
[*]Maybe animals
[*]More rooms
[*]Secret treasure room
[*]Mine
[*]More flora in the garden
[/list]
[u][b][size=4][color=red]If you guys have more ideas feel free to say it to me in the commands.
(I am from the Netherlands, sorry for my mistakes in the description.)[/color][/size][/u][/b]
author: antonijn
